title: Resources for Language Documentation and Archiving
content: Resources for Language Documentation and Archiving This catalogue entry points to a collection of comprehensive tutorials developed by Endangered Languages Archives (ELAR) to support language documenters and ELAR depositors. title: Linguistic Linked Open Data for Humanists
content: Linguistic Linked Open Data for Humanists Having achieved popularity as a way of publishing and accessing data in different fields of the sciences and for sharing large encyclopaedic datasets such as DBpedia (derived from Wikipedia), linked data is becoming more and more popular in different areas of the humanities.
